name: RádioSuccessFM
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio success f. m.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Success FM is a radio station that operates in the northwest region of Rio Grande do Sul and officially began its activities on March 26, 2016.

Since its founding, it has been working to meet the demands of the regional community, both in terms of music and in updating information, respecting the public interest.

On their first contact with the station, listeners are immersed in an infectious program that combines high spirits and innovation. A diverse musical sequence is valued to effectively serve our audience.

The team is made up of experienced professionals who understand the reality and customs of the region, seeking to develop an open dialogue with the population.

Disclaimer: Content in Portuguese

The radio's content is only in Portuguese. We do not guarantee complete accuracy and are not responsible for misunderstandings. Interruptions may occur. Your understanding is your responsibility.
